page.title: 19Tourism in Braunton.(2)
page.content: The majority of them came from either {Northern or Southern England}with one or two visitors from{Wales}and indeed from abroad.One person when asked came from Israel! When asked why they had taken their holiday in North Devon most people said that{the climate was {usually quite good, that the area was {not too expensive,and that the people {were friendly.}When asked whether there was anything they didn't like most complained that the{roads and {traffic}tended to spoil travelling around the countryside.The average tourist stays in the area for anything up to a month although{a fortnight}is the time of a usual trip. Almost{100% {of all tourists}asked stated that they liked Braunton very much, that they found the people friendly, and that they would recomend it as a place to come for a holiday to others at home.
